subtests.name: Navigator interface: navigator must inherit property "geolocation" with the proper type
Geolocation interface: navigator.geolocation must inherit property "getCurrentPosition(PositionCallback, PositionErrorCallback, PositionOptions)" with the proper type
Geolocation interface: calling getCurrentPosition(PositionCallback, PositionErrorCallback, PositionOptions) on navigator.geolocation with too few arguments must throw TypeError
Geolocation interface: navigator.geolocation must inherit property "watchPosition(PositionCallback, PositionErrorCallback, PositionOptions)" with the proper type
Geolocation interface: calling watchPosition(PositionCallback, PositionErrorCallback, PositionOptions) on navigator.geolocation with too few arguments must throw TypeError
Geolocation interface: navigator.geolocation must inherit property "clearWatch(long)" with the proper type
Geolocation interface: calling clearWatch(long) on navigator.geolocation with too few arguments must throw TypeError
